website_summaries.verdict: Multiple color choices made of strong steel. This bar stool set is designed to take abuse.
pros: We love how this set of four bar stools is heavy duty with a weight limit of 330 pounds
Steel is strong, durable, and easy to clean in the case of a mess
cons: Hard to separate if bar stools are stacked with enough force

customer_reviews.title: Splinters splinters splinters!  The wooden tops should be avoided.
customer_reviews.text: These look great, no doubt about it. But... do not get the ones with the wooden tops. Seriously. They just put some nice stained wood tops on them for seats but they are not sanded smooth or anything. I only picked one up to place it near the table and noticed how rough the tops are. If you have shorts on I guarantee you will end up with splinters. If wearing slacks or some sweats they will pull your threads out. Only jeans are safe for these wooden tops. I hope I can get a partial refund because now I have to sand these down on my own just to be able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: TechMoeBo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, high quality, super sturdy counter height stools
customer_reviews.text: Had these stools less than a week - but so far so great! They didn't even smell, as some reviews said, which was a plus. Great bright white color matches my new white cabinets well. They are super sturdy stools - which is important since this counter is where the kids sit. I haven't had to clean them yet, but I'm sure the powder paint finish will clean very well. I didn't have to contact customer service for any issues, but if I did I would know how, as they contacted me to make sure everything arrived as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are of great quality! They are sturdy and look really pretty! I took off one star because when you put your feet on the foot stand while sitting, it’s a bit of a squeeze on the legs, even for my youngest child (9). My tallest child (5”8) finds them a little too tall but that would be the case with any counter stool of this height. Overall, I am extremely happy with the stools, they look great and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality counter height stools!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy customer. We bought these stools because we wanted something sleek, modern and most importantly solid! These stools are great, just as promised. They are strong, stable and came fully assembled. They are stackable and I can tell they won’t need to be replaced anytime soon! They were a great price for a stool much stronger and better reinforced than the others advertised that look the same. (I did the research comparison before purchasing). They come in a variety of colors - white worked best for us). Free shipping, price was right and they were delivered quickly! Can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Roan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for replacement bar stools!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these counter height Bar Stools so much we ordered a second set. We are planing on finishing the wood seat with Mini Wax polycrilic clear satin as suggested in one of the positive reviews. Purchased from Amazon four 12 inch comfortable weatherproof seat pads in coffee color in picture and ordered 4 more black seat pads on back order for more fashion versatility. The stools were shipped immediately and packaged incredibly. Absolutely first class product and service that came with the perfect bar stools for our needs! Thank you UrbanMod!
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: These are great, inexpensive, sturdy and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I spent a few weeks traveling with my wife to local furniture stores, searching for counter height stools, for our newly renovated kitchen. After being shocked at the prices, we gave up and didn’t purchase anything. I found these on Amazon and decided to give them a try, I purchased 4 stools for what the local vendors were charging for one. I’m incredibly happy with the purchase, the stools are comfortable and sturdy, they also tuck nicely under counter. My only issue is I wish I didn’t waste so much time traveling to dozens of furniture stores before finding these. I highly recommend them and I’ve seen them in a few of my neighbors houses as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality counter height stools
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these stools for my lake house for seating in our large open kitchen where most folk tend to gather while inside. The quality of construction exceeded my expectations and we received unsolicited favorable comments from our guests that had been there prior to us purchasing the stools. I believe the stools to be a great value for the price with the Prime shipping option. The color of the rustic gunmetal was a bit darker an I had expected (more brownish than a preferred gray) but they are still esthetically applealing. If the wooden tops were offered on the other colored stools we would have likely chosen the silver color.
customer_reviews.author: T Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stool!
customer_reviews.text: The stools come in variety of different colors. They are lightweight and easy to move. It was well packaged for shipment. They come standard with a non-slip feet on the stool and they can also stack easily. They are made of metal and constructed beautifully. A magnet can stick to them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing but upkeep is impossible.
customer_reviews.text: *** corrected*** not good if you have kids. If you spill food or drinks on the stools and try to wipe them off, the wood fades and it doesn't completely come clean, food gets stuck in crevices and fade marks appear. I've had the stools for a few weeks and they look very used*** Loves. They come fully assembled, quality is great. Rubber soles so they won't be hard on your floors. They are a great fit for your Urban or rustic styled home. My kids think they're awesome, too!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I found these!! I needed stools without backs for my large island that we’re super durable and could withstand my four children’s roughness. These are perfect!! Not to mention how cute they are! I got the royal blue stools and they really give my kitchen that pop of color it so badly needed! Great quality, very well made, fast shipping, and super great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Haines

customer_reviews.title: Lovely barstools
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools arrived exactly as described and in perfect condition. They look great in my space and seem very sturdy. They are easy to stack and move in order to clean the floor and they do not mark my hardwoods. As a bonus, the box they arrived in is now an awesome toy for my kids. I would recommend them and i will actually probably need to order two more for my space.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. W. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are a great value. I received them yesterday and I was immediately surprised by how heavy and sturdy they were. Great height for my peninsula bar. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Via

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chairs
customer_reviews.text: These stools are honest to gosh heavy, solid, metal counter height stools that will work perfectly as extra seating around our current four-chair set. The foot rest is comfortable and the height perfect because it allows an inch or so for a pad on top. I really like that they are stackable and that they're cute stacked up and don't take much space when I don't need them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Did not deliver as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic construction and perfect look, but poor attention to detail in production and delivery. Seat wood grain flows in different direction on seats resulting in logo for fabricator facing in different directions. Also one of four chairs came with no plastic feet (unworkable for my wood floors). Thanks to Amazon for credit back. Would not recommend as a result. Other than that it would be five star perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Marc H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The stools are very durable and sturdy. The design is stackable without scratching the legs. Each leg also has rubber protection to help with our concrete floors. The white is a cooler blue color. It matches well with it kitchen and fit underneath our counter height glass table. I thought they would be uncomfortable to sit on but they are more comfortable than my chairs with cushion.
customer_reviews.author: hkopinions

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Second set of 4 stools we have orders. What can I say, they are sturdy, great colors, and solid price. Get em!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the white, they are a very bright white which I love! Overall exactly what I wanted. I just purchased a new home and love dressing up my kitchen with these barstools. Highly impressed with the company I purchased from as well. If you are on the fence go for these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for country/farmhouse style home
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the stools had some scratches and marks and I really needed them so I can't return them..as I was pulling them from the box I noticed all the marks..luckily rom afar they're not as noticeable And they're sturdy and match perfect with my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Not bad and really nice looking, however they really are not as comfortable as I’d like. Also make sure to measure your space before you buy because although they state standard bar height, they seem a little too short to me.
customer_reviews.author: Travis N. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible looking finish work. RETURNED !
customer_reviews.text: The finish work on these stools is VERY low quality. It appears that the stools were painted before the welds and buffing was done. The end result is a very poor quality looking finish. They just look cheap, or damaged. Every single stool was the same. The quality control is non-existent. I cant believe someone would ship these to a customer in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rotor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stools, Show Handprints/GREASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are sturdy, stylish and perfect for my kitchen. The one flaw that is bound to drive me crazy is that the wooden tops (style I ordered) show handprints and grease. Very obnoxious with 2 boys in the house. But hey, the price was right and I guess it means I’ll be cleaning them daily! UPDATE: I refused to clean them daily and so we have actually painted and sealed over the seat. We gave them a weathered white look and they’re perfect now :)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Rust and peeling paint.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these stools for exactly 1 year and they are now rusting / peeling paint. Funny the wood seats have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: VB - Georgia

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect. Each stool individually wrapped with foam
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried after reading other reviews that they would come scratched or bent. They were perfect. Each stool individually wrapped with foam, cardboard and plastic so they didn't rub against one another. I absolutely love them. They are bright white and wash up well.
customer_reviews.author: mommy 02

customer_reviews.title: Solid stools
customer_reviews.text: I followed the advice of another reviewer and sealed them to avoid any liquid damage from spills. However, I was being lazy and didn't sand before last coat and they are noticably rough. Not a big deal, will be get to it eventually but the wood wipes down much nicer and looks better too. Solid stools, just need a lil work to keep stain nice.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE USE LESS FLOOR SPACE THAN MANY BARSTOOLS
customer_reviews.text: Space was an issue for us and these being stack-able and having a smaller footprint made them our choice. There were some paint that was scratched on two of them, not terribly noticeable, but concerned about rust. Appears that the scratches were pre shipping, packaging was good. Some touch-up paint would do the trick. Haven't looked for any yet. Now we have four we can use rather than two and can store close to bar, with one hidden away.
customer_reviews.author: MGDA

customer_reviews.title: Finally I found great stools!!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally have bought 4 different stools in the last 2 months have have sent all of them back but these! I wasnt sure what to expect from the price. These are great!!!! They came but together, well packed and earlier then expected. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin  Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with whether to get the gun metal or silver bar stools and so glad I chose the gun metal. They couldn't be a better match for my kitchen. There were reviews that brought up issues with the wood bench being ruff/splintered, but I haven't found that to be the case. They were many companies that offered the same style bar stool but I recommend this one. They are really classy and no assembly required! I was worried that the box of 4 would be too heavy for me to handle alone but it was not. You won't be disappointed if you decide to purchase these bar stools!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on the legs
customer_reviews.text: Received these with scratches on the legs and we were afraid it is going to rust when it gets humid...because they are not cheap at all. The color is good and they are pretty sturdy, but we didn’t want to spend $150 for something that’s going to rust in a few months
customer_reviews.author: Kai Kai

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very nice looking seating for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our new kitchen island so that you can sit if you'd like. Bought them in white and liked them so much I bought them in red too! They are stackable and versatile and look like they will last a good long time. Comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, stylish, comfortable stools
customer_reviews.text: We bought a set of these stools in white. They are sturdy, and look great in our kitchen. They were put to immediate use filled with family to help peel the chestnuts for the Thanksgiving stuffing. Looking forward to many happy meals together!
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Barstool
customer_reviews.text: These are great and look fabulous in my kitchen. The price point is ideal for 4 barstools! They arrived super fast and were all in excellent condition. The packaging is well done and they are wrapped well in a sturdy box. You can't go wrong with these barstool.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I expected a 5 star product and I got a 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I expected a 5 star product and I got a 5 star product. Perfect counter height that replaced our bar stools. No more crouching over to eat! Love the blue color. Gives a nice splash of color to our otherwise conservative decor.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not galvanized metal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stools are a good height and relatively comfortable given it’s a metal stool. We bought 4 for our outdoor bar and the main reason we bought it was because it was stated to be galvanized metal (no rust) which was perfect for outdoor use. Not so...they rusted at the seams almost immediately! We never would have bought them if they’re rusted. They need to remove the galvanized statement as it’s false advertising. Not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are the sturdiest stools I have ever bought and they are awesome looking. I was a little worried when I ordered these in the blue but the color is perfect, not to bright. Very nice in our modern home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: white kitchen stools
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the stools in our kitchen and the remodel isn't quite finished. Once the kitchen is complete, they'll make a great addition to the decor and functionality of the space.
customer_reviews.author: viewer from Wilton

customer_reviews.title: So far! Great
customer_reviews.text: So far... They're great. Feel sturdy and rugged. We've had several types, wood, other metal types... HIGH TRAFFIC HOME HERE... All have broken or Needed to be repaired. We'll see how these hold up. Bigger people, have campers up on the family property during the summer and during hunting season and the winter months... Will revisit this review in 6 months and a year. So far... WE LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.author: DoveandRaven

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great color!
customer_reviews.text: I will be using these in my classroom this year for flexible seating. After buying cheaper plastic stools last year (that the kiddos broke by leaning back), I decided to invest in stools that were sturdy and safe. I believe these fit the bill. I only wish I could buy two more, but they only seem to come in packs of four😕. Otherwise, I’m very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: E. Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two sets of four. We placed some inside and some outside. Although I can’t comment on how they will hold up in weather, I will say they look and feel well made. I also can tell you that they are really comfy surprisingly. I love the rubber feet too. The chairs are packed with care as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, well painted
customer_reviews.text: stools came very well packaged. in perfect condition (all 4) and are sturdy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: These stools work great at our kitchen counter. The stools are great but the customer service is even better. I got updates on my order and follow ups after they were received from Steph C. Her communication and concern was greatly appreciated. I would definitely order from UrbanMod if and when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kim

customer_reviews.title: By far the best stool!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! The look is exactly what we were looking for. They are all made, do not wobble, lightweight. We live them. I wish they came in a two pack though. We looked for a long time for stools. Who would’ve thought at this price we would find what we wanted. You cannot go wrong. Very rustic and industrial looking.
customer_reviews.author: DTC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are terrific! They just match the bar perfectly. Love the sturdy footrest and the height is just right! Thank you for starting your company and a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: jenman

customer_reviews.title: Great value & style. Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these rustic style stools. They are perfect for seating in your kitchen around an island or peninsula. Look very sharp, they do not appear “cheap” looking at all, in spite of the great price. Sturdy. I like the wooden seat with the metal base. Color as pictured. Very satisfied & would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: NurseMom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE FOR A WELL MADE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: First thing I loved about these bar stools was that they came fully assembled, and were packed with care so that they didn't have a scratch on them. I bought four and they all came neatly stacked in one box. They really match the company's product description: Very sturdy, well made, LEVEL (which is awesome), and they are the perfect height! The wooden tops look terrific, and with the way they're assembled, there are no screws or nails showing on the seats. The natural texture of the wood provides a non-slip surface. SO COOL!!! I might have to buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Orangewhip

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Color just as pictured. I use 2 at kitchen island and 2 as side tables on couch ends. My husband takes them into garage when the guys are over working on cars. Very sturdy, wash up easily and rubber tips on feet keep it from scratching my tile floor. Versatile and adds a great pop of color. I think their a great value for the price also
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools are just what I need when I have extra company. I have a table with four chairs, a high table, and when I have company people are always crowded around this table, now I have stools that are pretty, sturdy and will take care of the extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Nice space saving stools
customer_reviews.text: Item is as discribed. Heavy duty for rowdy grandkids and goes great with my earth tone house. Love the stained wood seats. Read a review that had problems with the wood tops but there is no issues with my order. Great price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid and great looking stools.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, heavy duty stools at a great price, these are perfect in my art studio. I’ll be buying another set for an outdoor bar. Update: I have ordered three sets of these now, based on the first set being such a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. I'm keeping them
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly how it was shown. It works for what I need. One of chairs had small dent, might be front shipping. Very sturdy. I'm keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra seats for game night, and perfect color
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools showed up well-packed, arrived in perfect condition, have nice rubber feet for grip, and we love the blue color on them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ilikea

customer_reviews.title: WOW I LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: These stools are so much better in person. They are exactly what I was looking for. They are sturdy metal and look great. They are brilliantly packaged so that there are NO scratches on them anywhere. I am so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and much better than I expected. Perfect for what I need. Speedy shipping and packed well.
customer_reviews.author: gourmandbee

customer_reviews.title: Fit's your backside and improves your curb appeal
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. Came assembled and well protected in box. Construction and finish is ideal. Happy with the product and it's stability.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Pieraldi

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping arrived in 2 days! Great product at a great price. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, great at quality - ideal for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son’s new studio. Wanted something that could be stacked, so would save space in a small place. The looking and quality of the product were really good. The wood finishing of the seat matched very well with the small kitchen island. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: LUIZ A FRAZAO

customer_reviews.title: Cute stools
customer_reviews.text: Really like these stools. They are exactly what i expected. The only thing that has been a problem is that they mark up my floors and the rubber feet keep coming off. No big deal, but annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These awesome stools. This is the second set that we’ve purchased. They’re simple, have great colors, and are the right price for what you get. Id highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable and visually appealing.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stools for the price. $50 each. They look great in the gun metal color with the rich dark wood top. Rubber feet securely fastened to the legs to protect your floors. Comfortable to sit on for long periods and they are the perfect height at 24" for my 36" counter top bar. I'm 6'2 for reference as well. I'll update in the future with how they hold up but I doubt there will be any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Issues w height
customer_reviews.text: Too tall as a counter stool. Too short as a bar stool. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stools for us
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something stylish that was easy to clean and wouldn’t flip when our kids climbed up onto them. We love the look, they wipe down easy, and my 2 year old can climb up without even a wobble. Happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great stools for our outdoor kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on wear and tear yet, but we just got these for an outdoor kitchen that my husband built and they look great. We have only used the chairs a few times now, but not only are they sturdy and stylish, they are comfortable as well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just want I wanted. These barstools are very well made with an outstanding paint job. Hope they last a very long time. I've had them about a week, so only time will tell. I love the fact that I can stack them in the off season.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The stools are sturdy and stylish and look amazing in my breakfast nook.
customer_reviews.author: Lyne Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully finished product and no assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when these stools arrived assembled !! The product has a lovely finish, especially the combination of metal and wooden seats. I would highly recommend to anyone. The picture on amazon does not do them justice. Great value for money, very sturdy and easy to lift. I wish you sold dining tables !
customer_reviews.author: C Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great stools, seem durable, definitely sturdy. They come ready to use. The fact that they stack makes them invaluable for tight spaces around my outdoor oasis.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools!
customer_reviews.text: I received these stools and they look good and are perfect for kitchen counter height. I didn't notice right away, but one of the four stools was missing the rubber feet that protect the floor. I emailed the company and they sent me one replacement stool and issued me a credit, which I received very quickly. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Howell

customer_reviews.title: Quality !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. I fell in love right when I saw them. I had to return them because they didn’t fit the bar exactly as I had hoped BUT the return process was so simple and I plan to order again from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Karo665

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these stools months ago and just bought a second set. They work perfectly outside with a bar height table. Very nice looking and sturdy. Packaged well, arrived in perfect condition. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: shawnCA

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with the stools
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the stools. It's difficult to find the proper height stool for a kitchen counter height. While they might be an inch or two shorter than preferred, they work perfectly. The grandkids LOVE them. The cutout on the seat top make for simple movement of stools. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: suzykq

customer_reviews.title: Height just right for two nephews who are over 6' tall and over 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Very excited when delivery came earlier than expected. Fits perfect under and extended table and at right height when sitting to eat a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We love these. They fit perfectly with our countertop. The color accents well with our dark cabinets. They are sturdy, comfortable, well made and lightweight. Great deal for the price. Would definitely but them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Loved these stools! They came in speedy fast, the color (I got the bright blue ones) is solid and hardy for my middle school classroom, and they are sturdy and comfortable. Even the packaging was efficiently designed. I am the envy of the other teachers with my fabulous new stools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy & very well made. I bought 2 sets!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Fun color.
customer_reviews.text: Placed these around kitchen island. Perfect. Substantial weight. Look good.
customer_reviews.author: LoriBeede

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: Bar stools came in perfect condition. I loved that there was no assembly required. The height was a little bit shorter than expected, but I also didn’t take the time to measure how high they would be before ordering anyway. They work great for my kitchen island which sits right about counter height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my kitchen island. I purchased pack of 4 and it came just in a couple of days all assembled. Light to maneuver around , nice blue color as on the photo, indestructible as all my family and guests are using them.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Davern

customer_reviews.title: Love these bar stools!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for out kitchen counter height bar. Very sturdy and comfortable. Nice rubber feet so they don't scratch my tile. Came shipped stacked in one large box, well packaged. No complaints at all, wouldn't hesitate to buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: housewife deluxe

customer_reviews.title: Hold your eye and butt
customer_reviews.text: Simple, comfortable, colorful. Perfect for our kitchen island. Great place for the kids to sit while eating, doing homework, or coloring. Convenient place to drink coffee, read, or seat guests. Stackable, concealable, and no installation required. Perfect accessory to add durable color to your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stools for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 white counter height stools for my kitchen. They were delivered as promised and I couldn't be more pleased. They are sturdy and look terrific. I highly recommend the product and the sellers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These bar stools are awesome! The were packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are awesome! The were packaged perfectly, look great. The blue color is vibrant, perfect for the beach. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stools!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They can quickly, they were already assembled, and the quality is great... especially for the price! I may put a clear coating over the wood seat, because it is a little rough, but other than that, there great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to stack and store!
customer_reviews.text: We needed additional seats for around our island when we have parties. Saying that, we needed to be able to easily stack and store these for the 99.9% rest of our life. These are great! Sturdy. Easy to store. Dependable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: sharon hood

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and all sit perfectly without any wobble. Very happy with purchase! Highly recommend. Love the color and finish!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: We are enjoying using them and they are a perfect fit for our bar
customer_reviews.text: The bar stools we ordered and received were exactly what we expected. They were delivered fully boxed with no scratches. We are enjoying using them and they are a perfect fit for our bar.. I highly recommend these stools for anyone looking for attractive, durable, and quality bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: The stools are great. I had to return them because I ordered the wrong color. I needed Chicago Bears Blue and these where more like Chicago Cubs Blue. I am a Cubs fan but I am doing a Chicago Bears Bar.
customer_reviews.author: sheila paravich

customer_reviews.title: Love our stools!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these stools and there were dents in them, but we worked with their customer service team and they were quick to respond and sent us new ones. We LOVE our stools, they look great in our kitchen and they are sturdy. Would recommend these stools!
customer_reviews.author: Cassara Naccarato

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive chaits for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive stools that look good with any decor. My favorite thing about themnis thatvtheyvare stackable for easy storage. Only down fall is that bc they are metal they do dent easier then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for our patio table.
customer_reviews.text: After some searching we found these stools. Once they arrive we found they were just what we had been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: David Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy! They came stacked in a large box. Great for counter height bar. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: They are great!!!! So posh and so easy to use. They ate stackable so they don't get much space if you don't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kyriakidou

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the stools but my butt does not. They're not very comfortable. They work for our island decorations and if we have a lot of people over.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, but had several dents
customer_reviews.text: We loved the look of these stools at our kitchen counter. However, three of the four stools that we ordered had dents in them on the seat. They seem to be packed really well when they arrived, so I'm not sure what happened. Unfortunately, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about how much I love these. No assembly. STURDY. Will handle some weight. They came packed very securely. Paint looks great, smooth and even. Nice rubber pads on feet. Just perfect for my outdoor bar area. They arrived on time and would use this company again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed with these stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools are well made, sturdy and very stylish. They match our new kitchen decor perfectly. You will not be disappointed with these stools.
customer_reviews.author: GMan

customer_reviews.title: Like my new stools
customer_reviews.text: They came quickly and were well packaged. I like the look of them and they are as comfortable as could be expected for non-upholstered stools. They are the perfect height for my counter bar.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stools for outdoor bar!
customer_reviews.text: These came quickly and were packaged really well to avoid damage during shipping. They are perfect and I will be ordering more for inside!
customer_reviews.author: M&VW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stool!
customer_reviews.text: great stool for a counter bar. perfect to have your friends or family around the kitchen island hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shires

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these stools for our newly remodeled kitchen island. The work perfectly and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect for counters.
customer_reviews.text: These stools are as good as described. Sturdy and great looking. Perfect for our counter. We’re very pleased with our purchase. Packed excellently too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: One of best purchases I have made through Amazon! Excellent price, quality, appearance and packaging! I will be ordering more soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy
